#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,A[500];
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
		{
			cin>>A[i];
		}
		sort(A,A+n);
		int count=0;
		int i=0,j=n-1;
		while(i<=j)
		{
			if(count%2==0)
			{
				cout<<A[j--]<<" ";
			}
			else
				cout<<A[i++]<<" ";
			count++;
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
